tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE spending_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  report_date DATE,
  total_spending DECIMAL,
  income DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
  report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  spending_amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  saving_opportunity DECIMAL,
  report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE spending_reports (
   report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   report_name VARCHAR(255),
   total_spending DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE savings_categories (
   category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   category_name VARCHAR(255),
   target_savings DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE spending_details (
   detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   report_id INT, 
   category_id INT,
   spending_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
   FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES spending_reports(report_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES savings_categories(category_id)
)

CREATE TABLE spending_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    report_name VARCHAR(255),
    report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE spending_categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    category_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE savings_opportunities (
    opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    opportunity_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    potential_savings DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
 transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id UUID,
 amount DECIMAL,
 category VARCHAR,
 transaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
 user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR,
 email VARCHAR,
 age INT,
 gender VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE categories (
 category_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 name VARCHAR,
 parent_category_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE savings_goals (
 goal_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id UUID,
 goal_amount DECIMAL,
 target_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE transactions_history (
 transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id UUID,
 amount DECIMAL,
 category VARCHAR,
 transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
)
